title: A rule-based model. — rule_based_assessment
code: d <- data.frame(   y=c("apple", "apple", "not apple", "not apple"),   shape=c("round", "round", "square", "round"),   colour=c("green", "red", "green", "purple") )  f <- function(shape, colour) {   ifelse(shape == "round" & colour %in% c("green", "red"), "apple", "not apple") }  apple_classifier <- rule_based_assessment(y ~ shape + colour, d, f)  predict(apple_classifier, newdata=data.frame(shape="round", colour="indigo")) #> [1] "not apple"
